data.thought: S18|H|S15|Multi-system Phenotype C3: 'Incident Response Coordinator'. On PagerDuty alert: notebook activates. Queries: (1) Logs via Loki/CloudWatch MCP (2) Metrics via Prometheus MCP (3) Recent deploys via GitHub (4) Runbooks via internal docs. Thoughtbox: correlates signals, identifies probable cause, suggests remediation, drafts postmortem. Observable: investigation timeline, evidence graph, hypothesis tree. Auto-escalates if confidence low. Revolutionary: AI-first incident response.
